content: मद् A form of the first personal pronoun in the singular number used chiefly at the beginning of comps.; as मदर्थे ‘for me’, ‘for my sake’; मच्चिंत ‘thinking of me’; मद्वचनं, मत्संदेशः मत्प्रियं &c. &c.

मद् {vI.v} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (माद्यति, मत्त) {@--1@} To be drunk or intoxicated; वीक्ष्य मद्यमितरा तु ममाद <ls>Śi. 10. 27.</ls> {@--2@} To be mad. {@--3@} To revel or delight in. {@--4@} To be glad or rejoiced. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To satisfy, delight, gladden. {@--6@} To enjoy supreme felicity. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (मादयति) {@--1@} To intoxicate; inebriate, madden {@--2@} (मदयति) To exhilarate, gladden. delight; मायूरी मदयति मार्जनामनंसि <ls>M. 1. 21</ls>; प्रकृतिमधुराः संत्येवान्ये मनो मद यंति ये <ls>Māl. 1. 36</ls>, <ls>Śi. 13. 38</ls>, <ls>Ki. 5. 26.</ls> {@--3@} To inflame with passion; <ls>Māl. 3. 6.</ls> {@--4@} (<ab>Atm.</ab>) To be glad, rejoice, be pleased. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> ( मादयते) To please, gratify. {vIII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (मदति) {@--1@} To be proud. {@--2@} To be poor.
